00021 void clSpline::Initialise(void)
00022 {
00023   if(!initialised)
00024   {
00025     Parameterise();
00026     SecondDerivatives();
00027     FirstDerivatives();
00028 
00029     initialised = 1;
00030   }
00031 }
00032 
00033 void clSpline::Parameterise(void)
00034 {
00035   int rmax = X.GetNumberRows();
00036 
00037   u.SetNumberRows(rmax);
00038   u.SetNumberColumns(1);
00039 
00040   // Calculate the points distances
00041   u.SetElement(1, 1, 0.0);
00042   for(int i=2; i<=rmax; i++)
00043   {
00044     double xdist = X(i, 1) - X(i-1, 1);
00045     double ydist = Y(i, 1) - Y(i-1, 1);
00046     double zdist = Z(i, 1) - Z(i-1, 1);
00047     double dist  = u(i-1, 1) + sqrt(xdist*xdist + ydist*ydist + zdist*zdist);
00048 
00049     u.SetElement(i, 1, dist);
00050   }
00051 
00052   splineLength = u(rmax, 1);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void clSpline::FirstDerivatives(void)
00056 {
00057   double deltaU;
00058   double deltaX;
00059   double deltaY;
00060   double deltaZ;
00061 
00062   // Get maximum number of rows
00063   int rmax = u.GetNumberRows();
00064 
00065   X1.SetNumberRows(rmax); X1.SetNumberColumns(1);
00066   Y1.SetNumberRows(rmax); Y1.SetNumberColumns(1);
00067   Z1.SetNumberRows(rmax); Z1.SetNumberColumns(1);
00068 
00069   for(int r=1; r<rmax; r++)
00070   {
00071     deltaU = u.GetElement(r+1, 1) - u.GetElement(r, 1);
00072     if(fabs(deltaU)<PRECISION)
00073     {
00074       deltaU = PRECISION;
00075       //throw clException("clSpline", "FirstDerivatives", "Division by zero.");
00076     }
00077 
00078     deltaX = X.GetElement(r+1, 1) - X.GetElement(r, 1);
00079     deltaY = Y.GetElement(r+1, 1) - Y.GetElement(r, 1);
00080     deltaZ = Z.GetElement(r+1, 1) - Z.GetElement(r, 1);
00081 
00082     X1.SetElement(r, 1, fabs(deltaX)*(deltaX/deltaU - deltaU*X2(r, 1)/3.0 - deltaU*X2(r+1, 1)/6.0));
00083     Y1.SetElement(r, 1, fabs(deltaY)*(deltaY/deltaU - deltaU*Y2(r, 1)/3.0 - deltaU*Y2(r+1, 1)/6.0));
00084     Z1.SetElement(r, 1, fabs(deltaZ)*(deltaZ/deltaU - deltaU*Z2(r, 1)/3.0 - deltaU*Z2(r+1, 1)/6.0));
00085   }
00086 
00087   // Do last control point; work backwards
00088   deltaU = u.GetElement(rmax-1, 1) - u.GetElement(rmax, 1);
00089   if(fabs(deltaU)<PRECISION)
00090   {
00091     deltaU = PRECISION;
00092     //throw clException("clSpline", "FirstDerivatives", "Division by zero.");
00093   }
00094 
00095   deltaX = X.GetElement(rmax-1, 1) - X.GetElement(rmax, 1);
00096   deltaY = Y.GetElement(rmax-1, 1) - Y.GetElement(rmax, 1);
00097   deltaZ = Z.GetElement(rmax-1, 1) - Z.GetElement(rmax, 1);
00098 
00099   X1.SetElement(rmax, 1, fabs(deltaX)*(deltaX/deltaU - deltaU*X2(rmax, 1)/3.0 - deltaU*X2(rmax-1, 1)/6.0));
00100   Y1.SetElement(rmax, 1, fabs(deltaY)*(deltaY/deltaU - deltaU*Y2(rmax, 1)/3.0 - deltaU*Y2(rmax-1, 1)/6.0));
00101   Z1.SetElement(rmax, 1, fabs(deltaZ)*(deltaZ/deltaU - deltaU*Z2(rmax, 1)/3.0 - deltaU*Z2(rmax-1, 1)/6.0));
00102 }
00103 
00104 void clSpline::SecondDerivatives(void)
00105 {
00106   // Get maximum number of rows
00107   int rmax = u.GetNumberRows();
00108 
00109   // Check for minimum size matrix
00110   if(rmax<3)
00111   {
00112     throw clException("clSpline", "SecondDerivatives", "Need at least 3 points to create spline.");
00113   }
00114 
00115   // Set up matrices
00116   dMatrix tri(rmax-2, 3);
00117 
00118   dMatrix SX(rmax-2, 1);
00119   dMatrix SY(rmax-2, 1);
00120   dMatrix SZ(rmax-2, 1);
00121 
00122   // Set up all coefficients
00123   for(int i=2; i<rmax; i++)
00124   {
00125     double alpha = u(i, 1)-u(i-1, 1)       + PRECISION;
00126     double beta  = 2*(u(i+1, 1)-u(i-1, 1)) + PRECISION;
00127     double gamma = u(i+1, 1)-u(i, 1)       + PRECISION;
00128 
00129     int j=i-1;
00130     tri.SetElement(j, 1, alpha);
00131     tri.SetElement(j, 2, beta);
00132     tri.SetElement(j, 3, gamma);
00133 
00134     SX.SetElement(j, 1, 6*((X(i+1, 1) - X(i  , 1))/gamma - (X(i  , 1) - X(i-1, 1))/alpha) + PRECISION);
00135     SY.SetElement(j, 1, 6*((Y(i+1, 1) - Y(i  , 1))/gamma - (Y(i  , 1) - Y(i-1, 1))/alpha) + PRECISION);
00136     SZ.SetElement(j, 1, 6*((Z(i+1, 1) - Z(i  , 1))/gamma - (Z(i  , 1) - Z(i-1, 1))/alpha) + PRECISION);
00137   }
00138 
00139   // Calculate the second derivatives
00140   tri.SolveTri(SX);
00141   tri.SolveTri(SY);
00142   tri.SolveTri(SZ);
00143 
00144   // Substitute in appropiate vectors
00145   X2.SetNumberRows(rmax); X2.SetNumberColumns(1);
00146   Y2.SetNumberRows(rmax); Y2.SetNumberColumns(1);
00147   Z2.SetNumberRows(rmax); Z2.SetNumberColumns(1);
00148 
00149   {
00150     for(int i=1; i<=rmax; i++)
00151     {
00152       if(i==1 || i==rmax)
00153       {
00154         X2.SetElement(i, 1, (double)(0));
00155         Y2.SetElement(i, 1, (double)(0));
00156         Z2.SetElement(i, 1, (double)(0));
00157       }
00158       else
00159       {
00160         X2.SetElement(i, 1, SX(i-1, 1));
00161         Y2.SetElement(i, 1, SY(i-1, 1));
00162         Z2.SetElement(i, 1, SZ(i-1, 1));
00163       }
00164     }
00165   }
00166 }

00224 
00225 void clSpline::SetControlPoints(const dMatrix &cPoints)
00226 {
00227   // Check if matrix is in correct format.
00228   //   3 columns; 1 = x; 2 = y; 3 = z
00229   //   Number of rows is number of control points
00230   if(cPoints.GetNumberColumns() != 3)
00231   {
00232     throw clException("clSpline", "SetControlPoints", "Incorrect number of columns.");
00233   }
00234   else
00235   {
00236     int rmax = cPoints.GetNumberColumns();
00237     X.SetNumberRows(rmax); X.SetNumberColumns(1);
00238     Y.SetNumberRows(rmax); Y.SetNumberColumns(1);
00239     Z.SetNumberRows(rmax); Z.SetNumberColumns(1);
00240 
00241     for(int i=1; i<=rmax; i++)
00242     {
00243       X.SetElement(i, 1, cPoints(i, 1));
00244       Y.SetElement(i, 1, cPoints(i, 2));
00245       Z.SetElement(i, 1, cPoints(i, 3));
00246     }
00247   }
00248 }
00249 
00250 void clSpline::SetControlPoints(const dMatrix &cPointsX, const dMatrix &cPointsY, const dMatrix &cPointsZ)
00251 {
00252   // Check if dimensions are correct
00253   if((cPointsX.GetNumberColumns() != 1 || cPointsY.GetNumberColumns() != 1 || cPointsZ.GetNumberColumns() != 1) ||
00254      (cPointsX.GetNumberRows() != cPointsY.GetNumberRows()) ||
00255      (cPointsX.GetNumberRows() != cPointsZ.GetNumberRows()))
00256   {
00257     throw clException("clSpline", "SetControlPoints", "Dimensions of matrices do not match.");
00258   }
00259   else
00260   {
00261     X = cPointsX;
00262     Y = cPointsY;
00263     Z = cPointsZ;
00264   }
00265 }
00266 
00267 double clSpline::GetSplineLength(void)
00268 {
00269   if(!initialised)
00270   {
00271     Initialise();
00272   }
00273 
00274   return(splineLength);
00275 }
00276 
00277 dMatrix clSpline::GetControlPoints(void) const
00278 {
00279   dMatrix dummy;
00280 
00281   dummy.SetNumberRows(X.GetNumberRows());
00282   dummy.SetNumberColumns(3);
00283 
00284   for(int i=1; i<=X.GetNumberRows(); i++)
00285   {
00286     dummy.SetElement(i, 1, X(i, 1));
00287     dummy.SetElement(i, 2, Y(i, 1));
00288     dummy.SetElement(i, 3, Z(i, 1));
00289   }
00290 
00291   return(dummy);
00292 }
00293 
00294 dMatrix  clSpline::GetFirstDerivatives(void)
00295 {
00296   dMatrix dummy;
00297 
00298   if(!initialised)
00299   {
00300     Initialise();
00301   }
00302 
00303   dummy.SetNumberRows(X1.GetNumberRows());
00304   dummy.SetNumberColumns(3);
00305 
00306   for(int i=1; i<=X1.GetNumberRows(); i++)
00307   {
00308     dummy.SetElement(i, 1, fabs(X1(i, 1)) < PRECISION ? 0.0 : X1(i, 1));
00309     dummy.SetElement(i, 2, fabs(Y1(i, 1)) < PRECISION ? 0.0 : Y1(i, 1));
00310     dummy.SetElement(i, 3, fabs(Z1(i, 1)) < PRECISION ? 0.0 : Z1(i, 1));
00311   }
00312 
00313   return(dummy);
00314 }
00315 
00316 dMatrix  clSpline::GetSecondDerivatives(void)
00317 {
00318   dMatrix dummy;
00319 
00320   if(!initialised)
00321   {
00322     Initialise();
00323   }
00324 
00325   dummy.SetNumberRows(X2.GetNumberRows());
00326   dummy.SetNumberColumns(3);
00327 
00328   for(int i=1; i<=X2.GetNumberRows(); i++)
00329   {
00330     dummy.SetElement(i, 1, fabs(X2(i, 1)) < PRECISION ? 0.0 : X2(i, 1));
00331     dummy.SetElement(i, 2, fabs(Y2(i, 1)) < PRECISION ? 0.0 : Y2(i, 1));
00332     dummy.SetElement(i, 3, fabs(Z2(i, 1)) < PRECISION ? 0.0 : Z2(i, 1));
00333   }
00334 
00335   return(dummy);
00336 }

00338 dMatrix clSpline::GetCoordinates(const double uSpec)
00339 {
00340   dMatrix uDummy(1, 1);
00341   uDummy.SetElement(1, 1, uSpec);
00342 
00343   return(GetCoordinates(uDummy));
00344 }
00345 
00346 dMatrix clSpline::GetCoordinates(const dMatrix &uSpec)
00347 {
00348   dMatrix coord;
00349 
00350   if(uSpec.GetNumberColumns() != 1 || uSpec.GetNumberRows() == 0)
00351   {
00352     throw clException("clSpline", "GetCoordinates", "Invalid dimensions of matrix uSpec.");
00353   }
00354   else
00355   {
00356     coord.SetNumberRows(uSpec.GetNumberRows());
00357     coord.SetNumberColumns(3);
00358 
00359     if(!initialised)
00360     {
00361       Initialise();
00362     }
00363 
00364     // Do for all specified u's
00365     for(int i=1; i<=uSpec.GetNumberRows(); i++)
00366     {
00367       if(uSpec(i, 1) < 0 || uSpec(i, 1) > 1)
00368       {
00369         throw clException("clSpline", "GetCoordinates", "Invalid value for uSpec.");
00370       }
00371       else
00372       {
00373         // Now find the position of uSpec
00374         double uu = uSpec(i, 1)*GetSplineLength();
00375 
00376         int j = 1;
00377         while((uu - u(j+1, 1) > 0) && (j<u.GetNumberRows()-1))
00378         {
00379           j++;
00380         }
00381 
00382         // Now calculate the coefficients
00383         double A = (u(j+1, 1)-uu)/(u(j+1, 1)-u(j,1));
00384         double B = 1-A;
00385         double C = (A*A*A-A)/6 * (u(j+1, 1)-u(j, 1))*(u(j+1, 1)-u(j, 1));
00386         double D = (B*B*B-B)/6 * (u(j+1, 1)-u(j, 1))*(u(j+1, 1)-u(j, 1));
00387 
00388         // Finally calculate the coordinates
00389         coord.SetElement(i, 1, A*X(j, 1) + B*X(j+1, 1) + C*X2(j, 1) + D*X2(j+1, 1));
00390         coord.SetElement(i, 2, A*Y(j, 1) + B*Y(j+1, 1) + C*Y2(j, 1) + D*Y2(j+1, 1));
00391         coord.SetElement(i, 3, A*Z(j, 1) + B*Z(j+1, 1) + C*Z2(j, 1) + D*Z2(j+1, 1));
00392       }
00393     }
00394   }
00395 
00396   return (coord);
00397 }

00403 clSpline& clSpline::Assign(const clSpline &source)
00404 {
00405   initialised = 0;
00406 
00407   SetNumberID(source.GetNumberID());
00408   SetControlPoints(source.GetControlPoints());
00409 
00410   return(*this);
00411 }

00413 clSpline& clSpline::operator=(const clSpline &source)
00414 {

00416 }
